beer.name: Juniper Pale Ale
beer.description: A pale ale, saffron in color with a smooth malt balance, floral aroma with a dry spicy finish from whole juniper berries.
beer.grains: Northwest Harrington, Crystal, Triumph, Maier Munich & C-15. \nHops: Styrian Golding & Amarillo.
Northwest Harrington, Crystal, Triumph, Maier Munich & C-15. \nHops: Styrian Golding & Amarillo.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
